content: अभिग्रह् (<ab>Ved.</ab> ग्रभ्) {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To take or seize, catch, catch hold of, seize forcibly, attack; रिपुणाभिगृह्य <ls>Dk. 5</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">98</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">103.</ls> {@--2@} To accept, take. {@--3@} To receive, (as a guest). {@--4@} To fold, lay or bring together (as the hands). {@--5@} To set, show or bring forth (as blossom, fruit &c.). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To catch or surprise one in the very act, to let oneself be so caught; अर्यवर्यस्य कस्यचिद् गृहे चोरयित्वा रूपाभिग्रहितो बद्धः <ls>Dk. 96.</ls>
